```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(bubbles)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

health_infrastructure <- read_excel("health-infrastructure.xlsx")

health_infrastructure <- health_infrastructure |> 
  select(Institutions, Quantity)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

health_staff <- health_infrastructure |> 
  slice(7:n())


health_institutes <- health_infrastructure |> 
  slice(1:6)


```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

health_staff <- health_staff |> 
  mutate(label = paste(Institutions,Quantity, sep="\t"))



```

```{r know, echo = FALSE, out.width = "100%", fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics("health-infrastructure.png")
```
